snippet.title: Achilles: Survivor - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Achilles: Survivor is a dynamic single-player bullet heaven game where you’ll face thousands of enemies in quick game sessions, build destructive structures, and develop your character to return as an even more powerful machine of destruction.

Return to the world of the action RPG Achilles: Legends Untold and slay them all, as you transition from hero to god of destruction. Expand your arsenal with a unique building mechanic that adds a new layer of strategy to the bullet heaven genre. 

The first playable version of Achilles: Survivor will debut during the Steam Next Fest starting on October 14.

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2922410 
Discord: https://discord.gg/P6ayW6peX5
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61565916984325
Twitter: https://x.com/DarkPointGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/darkpointgames
